thread.title: Atul Auto, Federal Bank come together for dealer financing arrangement
thread.title_full: Atul Auto, Federal Bank come together for dealer financing arrangement

title: Atul Auto, Federal Bank come together for dealer financing arrangement
text: #Ashok Leyland Atul Auto, Federal Bank come together for dealer financing arrangement Under this arrangement, the bank will finance 100 per cent of the invoice amount with nil margin to registered dealers of AAL for purchases made from the company. PTI | 28 August 2015, 8:26 AM IST Share NEW DELHI: Rajkot - based leading manufacturer of 3-Wheeler commercial and passenger vehicles Atul Auto has tied up with Federal Bank for a dealer financing arrangement.This tie-up is aimed at benefiting all the 200-plus dealers of AAL spread across India. Under this arrangement, the bank will finance 100 per cent of the invoice amount with nil margin to registered dealers of AAL for purchases made from the company.Federal Bank has dealer financing arrangements in place with leading brands like Tata Motors , Mahindra & Mahindra and Ashok Leyland."Federal Bank's competitive products and wide reach across India will surely nurture a value addition to AAL dealers and our customers... This will surely boost our sales and revenues. We will also look into further strengthening our relationships in days to come," J V Adhia, President Finance, AAL said.
